item.title: Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Both of those commands are gnarly…

public String getYellTitle() { switch(playerRights) { case 2: return "<col=16224512>Administrator</col>"; case 1: return "<col=12756>Moderator</col>"; default:// For rights 0 and any other non-listed rank... return "<col=25500>Player</col>"; } }

And then your command…

if(playerCommand.toLowerCase().startsWith("yell")) { if(Connection.isMuted(c)) { c.sendMessage("You're muted, no one can hear you scream."); return; } if(playerCommand.length < 5) { c.sendMessage("You must say something in your yell."); return; } for(Player p : PlayerHandler players) { if(p != null) ((Client)p).sendMessage(c.playerRights > 0 ? "<img=" + c.playerRights + ">[" + c.getYellTitle() + "]" : "" + playerCommand.substring(5)); } }

item.title: Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

Just use mine. You might have to change a few names for the c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase parts, but it should work.

[code=java]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

						if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=15308544>[Moderator] <img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=16711680>[Admin] <img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 4){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator] <img=3>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("system")){
							c2.sendMessage("<img=2> <shad=255>[System Message] " 
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("zen")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=255>[Owner] <img=2><img=2>Zen<img=2><img=2>: " 
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("the king")){
							c2.sendMessage("<img=2> <shad=16711680>[Ruler of DelevationScape] <img=2> The King: " 
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

						
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("moderator")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=15308544>[Moderator] <img=2>Moderator: " 
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=15308544>[Admin] <img=2>Admin: " 
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						
						}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=12595455>[Developer] <img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						
						}else if (c.playerRights == 0){
							c.sendMessage("<shad=16711680>This command is only available to Donators & Staff.");
								
						}
					}
				}
			}
    
    
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

Here Is my Yell command

[code]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”) || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“Yell”) || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“YELL”) || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“yel”))
for (int j = 0; j < PlayerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (PlayerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)PlayerHandler.players[j];

						if (!Connection.isMuted(c)) {
				if (c.playerRights == 6) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=800000000><img=3>[Head-Dev]</col><img=3>"+ Misc.optimizeText3(c.playerName) +":</col> "
						                                        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");							
				if (c.playerRights == 0) {
					c2.sendMessage("[<col=25500>Player</col>] "+ Misc.optimizeText3(c.playerName) +":</col> "
						                                        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 1) {
					c2.sendMessage("<img=1>[<col=12756>Moderator</col>] "+ Misc.optimizeText3(c.playerName) +":</col> "
						                                        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 2){
					c2.sendMessage("<img=2>[<col=16224512>Administrator</col>] "+ Misc.optimizeText3(c.playerName) +":</col> "
						                                        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 3) {
					c2.sendMessage("<img=2>[<col=8532295>Owner</col>] "+ Misc.optimizeText3(c.playerName) +":</col> "
						                                        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 4) {
					c2.sendMessage("<img=4>[<col=16723968>Donator</col>] "+ Misc.optimizeText3(c.playerName) +":</col> "
						                                        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 5) {
					c2.sendMessage("<img=5>[@whi@Support@bla@] "+ Misc.optimizeText3(c.playerName) +":</col> "
						                                        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				} else if (c.playerRights == 6) {
					c2.sendMessage("<shad=800000000><img=3>[Head-Dev]</col><img=3>"+ Misc.optimizeText3(c.playerName) +":</col> "
						                                        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				/*} else if (c.playerRights == 7)
					c2.sendMessage("["+c.yellName+"]<img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText3(c.playerName) +": " + text +"");*/
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

}[/code]
The only yell that works is the Player yell, nothing is different between any of them but none of the other ones work… If I remove the } else if I get errors, so thats not the issue.
Help please?
